Name: The Letterbox Roses
Description:
Brighten someone’s day with Moonpig Letterbox Flowers. With high quality bouquets for all occasions, you can create a memorable moment of pure loveliness in the comfort of their own home.

Introduction
Nothing pleases quite like a bouquet of roses, right? And this bouquet really is the crème de la crème. With pink and white roses and greenbell foliage, it's the perfect day-brightening gift! Plus, this bouquet is delivered straight through the letterbox so you don't even need to be home when it arrives!

What’s in the Box?
4 x Pink rose
4 x White rose
4 x Cerise rose
1 x Greenbell

Total bouquet length: 50cm

The Important Part: 

  • We promise five days’ freshness or a free replacement with every bouquet.
  • Select your date or get next day delivery when you order by 9pm Monday-Friday. Plus, get SMS tracking and a 2 hour delivery window.
  • Our flowers arrive in bud and will come into bloom within a day or two. This means fresher flowers for longer – yay!

Please Note:

  • In the rare event that any flowers become unavailable or are not quite up to standard, we’ll replace them with flowers of similar or superior style, quality and value.
  • Large cards are too big to fit in our letterbox flower boxes! If ordered with a large card, they will be sent separately.
  • Box size 62.2cm x 18.3 cm x 3.7 cm; designed to fit through most standard UK letterboxes.
  • The vase is not included.
Title: The Letterbox Roses
